symbols.name: LineWidget
symbols.summary: Abstract base class for all line widgets.  Line widgets show a unique marker based on information from [class@Gpte.Line].

symbols.summary: The *Mable* style for [class@GpteGtk.LineWidget] uses extends [class@GpteGtk.LineWidgetQuartzite] by adding the line label next to the icon box from ...

symbols.summary: This widget provides a text field with autocompletion for location entry.  In order to get notified about a ...

symbols.name: new
symbols.summary: Creats a new [class@GpteGtk.LineWidget] using the *Marble* style.

symbols.name: new
symbols.summary: Creats a new [class@GpteGtk.LineWidget] using the *Quartzite* style.

symbols.name: new
symbols.summary: Creats a new search entry widget using @provider.

symbols.name: get_entry
symbols.summary: Gets the [iface@Gtk.Editable] in use by @self.  This is useful for [method@Gtk.SearchBar.connect_entry].

symbols.name: get_line
symbols.summary: Gets the current line displayed by this widget.

symbols.name: get_location
symbols.summary: Gets the currently selected location of this search entry, or %NULL if no such location exists.

symbols.name: get_max_suggestions
symbols.summary: Gets the maximal amount of location suggestions to lookup.

symbols.name: get_provider
symbols.summary: Gets the currently active provider.

symbols.name: get_provider
symbols.summary: Gets the provider currently in use to lookup locations.

symbols.name: get_show_clear
symbols.summary: Gets if this widget shows a clear button.

symbols.name: set_line
symbols.summary: Updates the line that this widget is supposed to display.

symbols.name: set_location
symbols.summary: Overwrite the selected location for this entry.

symbols.name: set_max_suggestions
symbols.summary: Sets the maximal amount of location suggestions to lookup.  Set to `0` to use the provider default.

symbols.name: set_provider
symbols.summary: Updates to provider icon to @provider.

symbols.name: set_provider
symbols.summary: Updates the provider that will be used to lookup locations.  If @provider is %NULL, no location lookups are performed.

symbols.name: set_show_clear
symbols.summary: Sets if @self should show a clear button besides it.
